Package wigzo.android.sdk

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvertisingIdAdapter  
    CertificateTrustManager  
    ConnectionProcessor
    ConnectionProcessor is a Runnable that is executed on a background thread to submit session & event data to a Count.wigzo.ly server.
    ConnectionProcessorWigzoApp
    Created by wigzo on 17/3/16.
    ConnectionQueue
    ConnectionQueue queues session and event data and periodically sends that data to a wigzo server on a background thread.
    DeviceId  
    EventQueue
    This class queues event data locally and can convert that event data to JSON for submission to a wigzo server.
    MessagingAdapter  
    OpenUDIDAdapter  
    ReferrerReceiver
    ADB Testing adb shell am broadcast -a com.android.vending.INSTALL_REFERRER --es "referrer" "wigzo_cid%3Dcb14e5f33b528334715f1809e4572842c74686df%26wigzo_cuid%3Decf125107e4e27e6bcaacb3ae10ddba66459e6ae"
    UserData  
    Wigzo
    This class is the public API for the Wigzo Android SDK.
    WigzoAppStore
    Created by wigzo on 15/3/16.
    WigzoStore
    This class provides a persistence layer for the local event & connection queues.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeviceId.Type
    Enum used throughout Wigzo which controls what kind of ID Wigzo should use.
    Wigzo.WigzoMessagingMode
    Enum used in Wigzo.initMessaging() method which controls what kind of app installation it is.
